original_text: Then, in future years, your descendants will see that many troubles have come to your land. They will see that the Lord has made people very ill. Foreign people who come from countries far away will also see what has happened.
korean_text: 너희 뒤에 일어나는 너희의 자손과 멀리서 오는 객이 그 땅의 재앙과 여호와께서 그 땅에 유행시키시는 질병을 보며

sentences.original_text: that many troubles have come to your land.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 환난들이 당신의 땅에 왔다는 것을.

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has made people very ill.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 사람들을 매우 아프게 하셨다는 것을.

sentences.original_text: who come from countries far away
